QuestData.Title: Unyielding Fists: Trial of Wood
QuestData.Description: You have progressed in your training, I think. Come with me, and we will attempt the Trial of Wood.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Master Bruised Paw, then successfully strike the Stack of Wooden Blocks 4 times.
QuestData.RewardText: You have the gift of focus, $n. Not many of my students make it this far.$b$b<Master Bruised Paw glances over at Lin.>

Objectives.Objective: Strike the Stack of Wooden Boards
